item.description:
I have been to this Cafe a few times in the past.

I thought that some members who live in that area would like to try it out.

Anyone who enjoys coffee is welcome to come!

http://www.commongrounds.com/

www.commongrounds.com/

The best parking is in the parking lots in the side
Streets off of the Main Street.

Some days due to traffic on I - 95 and the back roads on the weekend,
it takes a while to get there from West Haven to Branford!

So I might be a few minutes late.

Like all Meet Ups this time of year, it will be canceled if there is bad weather.

For those of you who live off I-91 North or live west of New Haven, I do not need

To read how this is too far away from you.  

Mike B
Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: It is a small Cafe, I will have a Purple Back Pack

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: Unknown Zone Goes Back to Common Grounds
